<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Assignee by ID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/api/incidents/assignee/{assigneeId}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve information about your assignees that you can use to monitor team members who can examine incidents.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"The ID of the assignee for the incident.","in":"path","name":"assigneeId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

OK

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"createdAt"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The creation time of the DLP incident","example":"yyyy-MMM-dd HH:mm:ss z","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"emailAddress"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Email address of the assignee","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"firstName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"First name of the assignee","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"uuid"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ID of the assignee","format":"uuid","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"lastName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Last name of the assignee","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"status"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`ACTIVE`, `INACTIVE`]"} schema={{"description":"Signifies whether the assignee is active or inactive","enum":["ACTIVE","INACTIVE"],"example":"\"ACTIVE\" or \"INACTIVE\"","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tenantId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The TSG enabled tenant group ID","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"updatedAt"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The last updated time of the incident","example":"yyyy-MMM-dd HH:mm:ss z","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"}
